alert.note: Alert for Livingston Area; Northern Park; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 26 at 2:20PM MST until January 28 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 6 and 12 inches possible. * WHERE...Livingston Area, Northern Park, and Paradise Valley. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 6 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult Friday into Saturday with roads becoming snow packed with poor visibility in snow and blowing snow. This includes the Bozeman Pass vicinity. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers will increase tonight with snow becoming by Friday night. Morning and evening commutes will be impacted by snow packed roads and poor visibility.
info.instruction: People should consider delaying travel. If travel is absolutely necessary, drive with extreme caution. Consider taking a winter storm kit along with you, including such items as tire chains, booster cables, flashlight, shovel, blankets and extra clothing.

area.areaDesc: Livingston Area; Northern Park; Paradise Valley
